title: Camila Cabello displays her abs in edgy crop top and red hot trousers
text:
Fresh off of her performance at the We Can Survive event, Camila Cabello quickly headed off to celebrate her friend Andrew Watt's birthday.

The 22-year-old singer stepped out in a vibrant red outfit on Saturday evening after performing some of her hit songs at the Hollywood Bowl.

She seemed to be in a good mood as she posed for the cameras while heading inside to the Beverly Hills bash that hosted some other big names such as Adam Levine, Justin and Hailey Bieber, and Jared Leto.

Red hot: Camila Cabello stepped out in a vibrant red outfit on Saturday evening after performing some of her hit songs at the Hollywood Bowl.

Camila wore a white cropped graphic t-shirt that showed off her toned figure. The shirt said 'romance' on it and had a big red 'x' through the middle.

She matched the red in her shirt with a pair of high waisted red pants and black shoes.

The Havana singer had a face full of makeup and her hair done after coming from the performance and appeared to leave her new boyfriend Shawn Mendes at home.

Party look: Camila wore a white cropped graphic t-shirt that showed off her toned figure. The shirt said 'romance' on it and had a big red 'x' through the middle

In recent months the new Hollywood couple has been attached at the hip while out and about in their honeymoon phase.

But rumors began to swirl that the two powerhouse singers were no more after not being spotted out recently.

But Cabello decided to take things into her own hands sharing a screenshot of a headline to her Instagram story saying: 'Well when the f–k were you gonna tell me @shawnmendes,' she said in the playful comment.

Stunning: Camila turned heads in her gorgeous black number as she performed some of her hit songs at the We Can Survive concert at the Hollywood Bowl

He even shared his own steamy photo putting the rumor mill to rest wit ha spicy photo of the two sharing a kiss with his arms wrapped around her.

Shawn and the former Fifth Harmony member kept their relationship on the down low for awhile until she opened up to U.K.'s Capital Breakfast radio earlier this month saying she 'really really loves him a lot.'

'It was so fun, we've been friends for a really long time… there was a period where we didn't hang out as much just 'cause we were both busy. And this song was really fun because we got to just hang out again like we did on the song we did before, 'I Know What You Did Last Summer,' which is when we got really close,' she said of their budding relationship.
